Package structures.integers

Class MatrixOfInt

  • java.lang.Object
    • structures.integers.MatrixOfInt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Freeable, MemoryObject
    public class MatrixOfInt
extends java.lang.Object
implements MemoryObject
    The class representing a matrix of int
    This prevent the creation of many arrays of int as it can be free and reused.
